quest.name: My Friend the Yeti
journal:
 Quest Sync
The young Arkasodara is staring off into the jungle with worry in his eyes.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter any phrase containing “Sushena” to call out for him.
Use the healing salve on Sushena.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: Ah, excuse me, but you're a traveler, yes? Would you be willing to take on a personal request? I'm worried for the safety of a friend of mine, and would ask you to check on them.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: Thank you. I know you have no shortage of demands on your time. My friend, you see, he's a bit of a private person, and I only wish to know how he is faring after the recent troubles.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: However, the journey to his abode is much too dangerous for me to attempt alone, and I wouldn't dare ask another villager to go in my stead. A traveler with a sharp blade, however, could surely get the task done with little effort.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: He resides in the jungle to the northwest, or at least, he used to. I'll mark the location on your map─his name is Sushena, and if you say his name, he should respond.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: If my worst fears have come to pass and he is wounded, please use this medicine to treat his wounds. You will be rewarded for your efforts, but I suspect you would have helped me even if I had nothing to give in return.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: I've marked the location that Sushena dwells on your map. Say his name, and hopefully he will respond in turn.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Sushena

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “Sushena” near the area marked on your map.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You hear faint sounds of an animal in pain emanating from the direction of the bluffs. Investigate its source.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The yeti appears to be wounded. Perhaps the medicine provided to you will alleviate its suffering.

dialogue.name: FRIEND04262
dialogue.text: <huff> <pant>...Ugwah...<pant>...Ungeh...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Although you cannot understand the yeti's words, you can sense the gratitude behind them. Return to the young Arkasodara and inform him that his friend is well.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: Welcome back, traveler! So, how was he?

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: Oh, that's horrible! Still, I suppose I can be grateful that you could treat his wounds. I owe Sushena my life─when I was attacked by one of those terrible pisaca, Sushena's roar drove the monster off.

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: That was the start of our friendship─one I've treasured ever since. But my family has forbidden me from venturing into the woods, so I haven't been able to check up on him. I know they're only worried for my safety, but still...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You should explain everything to them.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You shouldn't abandon your friend!

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: You're right, of course. Surely if I explain Sushena's bravery and selflessness, they'd understand. I've nothing to lose by trying, anyways!

dialogue.name: YOUTH04262
dialogue.text: Thank you. Not only did you save Sushena, but you've reminded me what true friendship is worth. It's not much, but please, take this!
